blocks.title: Hello, darling.
blocks.content: We design and build custom digital products and experiences.

We partner with consumer brands to make beautiful things. Sometimes these things are mobile apps, sometimes they’re websites. Sometimes they defy categorization. But no matter what, they make the world a smarter and brighter place.

blocks.title:
Darling,
let’s be daring.
blocks.content: Design is like climbing monkey bars. You've gotta let go to move forward.

blocks.title:
Human-centered.
Strategically led.
Creatively driven.
blocks.content: We're a passionate team of designers, developers, strategists and creative problem solvers. We help marketers, product teams and entrepeneurs create integrated digital experiences that push technical boundaries and drive results.

contents.content:
Design

  • Identity & Style Guides
  • Interface and Visual Design
  • Motion and Interaction
  • Pattern Libraries
  • Digital Campaigns

We dig deep.

Designing for human experience starts by understanding all the little details of your business. We collaborate with our partners to understand the unique space and opportunity that exists in your brand and the category at large.

We fear nothing.

Courage is contagious. We are natural born problem solvers who love to take big and meaningful chances with our work. We push ourselves to be bold, original and courageous in our creations. We push our clients to do the same.

We sweat the small stuff.

Some people think design means how something looks, but its really about how well it works. Seamless little experiences ultimately combine to create epic outcomes. Details matter. And to us, there’s no such thing as “small stuff”.

CorePower Yoga is the largest privately held chain of yoga studios in the United States. With over 200 yoga studios nationwide, CorePower Yoga roots an intensely physical workout in the mindfulness of yoga, helping students change their bodies and their lives.

Our challenge was to transform and redesign the CorePower Yoga mobile app with a goal of creating a seamless, and engaging experience for a user base of over 250,000 yogis. Team Darling focused on delivering an app that exceeded CorePower Yoga customer expectations by understanding and anticipating their needs.

The final product is an app that is clean, streamlined and simple to use. CorePower Yoga customers can easily search and filter classes, set goals and monitor their progress. The app also provides curated content to motivate and inspire CorePower Yoga students.

blocks.quotation: I love this app! So much better than the last version. It is really nice to be able to have several filters that can be saved given I travel so often. This makes it much easier to find a class. I would highly recommend this app to anyone!

jumbotronContent: Strategic mobile app redesign to heighten the user experience and boost engagement for a base of over 250,000 yogis.
workIndexSubtitle: Content Strategy, Mobile App UX, Mobile App Visual Design

contents.content:
Jopwell is a career advancement platform for Black, Latinx, and Native American students and professionals that helps unlock professional opportunities. Jopwell also assists companies with their diversity recruitment and marketing efforts.

Corporate diversity initiatives usually rely on partnerships with nonprofits that can only handle small-scale amounts of hiring. So Darling created a platform that transforms how companies view both the importance of, and the process for, accomplishing minority representation.

As a result, Jopwell was accepted to, and completed the SU2015 Y-Combinator term. It currently displays job openings for startup, enterprise and non-profit organizations across the country. Some of the biggest names include: Facebook, Goldman Sachs, BuzzFeed, Adobe and Mastercard.

blocks.quotation: It was incredible working with the Darling team as they were truly a trusted partner and advisor throughout the entire design process. The team is truly passionate about their work and that bleeds through to the final product. Jopwell was very well served through our partnership and we were able to accomplish amazing things together.

jumbotronContent: A robust career advancement platform for Black, Latinx, and Native American students and professionals.
casestudySubtitle: Changing the landscape of minority recruitment.
workIndexSubtitle: Brand Identity, Collateral, User Experience Design, Visual Design

contents.content:
To celebrate the launch of Ventrix™ Jacket and its heat release technology, The North Face, Spotify and musician Maggie Rogers collaborated to create “The Release Project,” an immersive digital experience that allowed Rogers’ track, “Split Stones” to be released layer by layer through movement.

How it works: Spotify listeners are prompted to engage with The North Face Ventrix™ ad on their mobile device. The more the user moves, the more of Maggie Roger’s track is realeased. Just walking? Only the bass line is audible. With more movement, more layers of the song are played until ultimately the full length track is unlocked and available to download.

The Northface engaged Darling to design this one-of-a-kind digital experience, from start to finish. Working closely with the integrated North Face and Spotify team, Darling created a visual atmosphere for the campaign. The heat releasing technology of the jacket is mirrored throughout the experience by layering rich content with motion, color, texture and sound. Darling then created a suite of brand assets as a toolkit that could be used by the The North Face team in their campaign.

blocks.quotation: I took the first sound samples for ‘Split Stones’ on a month-long backpacking trip in Oregon during the summer of 2013; I’ve been collecting samples and piecing the song together in bedroom studios and trails ever since. I’m super excited about combining the two things I love-technology and the environment-to create a way that people can hear the song, but also feel a little bit a part of the action and process that inspired it.
blocks.citation: Musician, singer-songwriter, and producer Maggie Rogers

jumbotronContent: A new mobile experience designed to debut North Face's Ventrix jacket and artist Maggie Rogers' new single "Split Stones".
casestudySubtitle: Providing the best gear for athletes and the modern day explorers.
workIndexSubtitle: Art Direction, Motion Direction, Experience Design, Interface Design

contents.content:
Curacubby is an online software platform, designed to simplify student enrollment and billing/payment processing for schools and child care programs of all sizes. Parents can access invoices and make payments at home or on their mobile devices, anytime.

Our challenge was to design and develop a distinctive website that would differentiate Curacubby from the competition. Darling created a content strategy and design approach that helped Curacubby stand-out, get noticed, and see results.

Curacubby’s new website effectively communicates the benefits of the Curacubby product while leveraging a more playful aesthetic. By using bold imagery, custom illustrations and micro-animations, the site delivers unexpected moments of surprise and delight.

blocks.quotation: The team at Darling provided strategy, technical expertise, and implementation in the most efficient manner; allowing us to focus on growing the company without worrying about losing time to do things outside of our core competencies. If you have design issues that require professional guidance, top agency talent, and stress-free communications, look no further than Darling!

casestudySubtitle: Helping schools save time and money.
jumbotronContent: Responsive website and brand refresh for a leading provider of online student enrollment and automated billing solutions.
workIndexSubtitle: Brand Refresh, User Experience Design, Visual Design, Webflow Development

contents.content:
The Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art, founded in 1859 by Peter Cooper, prepares talented students to make enlightened contributions to society through outstanding academic programs in architecture, art and engineering. The institution provides a challenging, interactive curriculum with distinguished, creative faculty and fosters rigorous, humanistic learning in a dynamic setting.

Cooper Union experienced a decline in website traffic because the site was not optimized for mobile. Darling partnered with Copper Union to redesign the mobile navigation based on behavioral patterns.

The result was a mobile-first framework that increased website traffic and conversion and also improved user experience.

casestudySubtitle: Offering education in art, architecture, engineering, humanities and social sciences.
jumbotronContent: A mobile site designed to drive traffic, engage parents of prospects, and re-engage existing students.
workIndexSubtitle: Content Strategy, Visual Design, Interaction, Prototyping

contents.content:
Bold, smooth & awesome, Stōk Cold-Brew Iced Coffee brings you all the delicious, bold flavor of lightly sweetened coffee without the hassle of using a coffee grinder, coffee filters and coffee maker.

When denver-based WhiteWave Foods, a consumer packaged food and beverage company, introduced Stōk Cold-Brew Coffee to their portfolio, they partnered with Darling to create a bespoke, brand manifesto. The goal of the project was to design a brand guidelines booklet, that was visual in approach, exuded the rugged, trailblazing spirit of the product, and authentically represented the method and craft of a high end cold brew.

blocks.quotation: I was very impressed with the Darling team. They provided unique perspectives and creative solutions in helping shape the visual identity for Stōk. I can always count on them for fresh thinking and great design.
blocks.citation: Eric Winslow, Senior Design Manager, WhiteWave Foods

casestudySubtitle: Slow brewed. Like all of the best ideas.
workIndexSubtitle: User Experience Design, Art Direction, Visual Design
